text: "As Pod Save America listeners know I relish my role as a self appointed media critic.
(groans) This was particularly true during the 2016 campaign when I thought the press was giving Hillary Clinton a raw deal.
I am motivated by my own partisan bias and desire to work with the referees for a better result and an itchy twitter finger even though it is rarely - (Matt: "Itchy twitter finger??"
ugggh) even though it's rarely constructive.

I can't help myself, I know the media is interested in my opinion, on their job performance as I am interested in their opinion on how I ran the Obama communication shop, but, and this is a big but, I love journalism and want more of it.
I decided to go into politics in large part because on my first day at Georgetown University, someone stopped by my dorm room offering a great deal on a Washington Post subscription.
I soaked up every detail about what was happening on Capitol Hill and in the White House, each just a few miles away.
I've been a news addict ever since. "
